About Me

Know more about me!

Hi, I'm Abisam Hazim, a passionate web developer with a focus on creating dynamic and user-friendly websites. Which interest in front-end and back-end development, I specialize in working with modern frameworks like Laravel, bootstrap, tailwind. My goal is to build seamless digital experiences that not only meet client expectations but also enhance user engagement.

Let's be friends

When I'm not writing code, I enjoy gaming, photograph, designing, reading novels which help me stay creative and inspired. Skills

My Skills

This is the programming language, Framework, Tools I currently use for Frontend, backend and design

Front End

Creating modern and responsive web interfaces using frameworks like CSS, Tailwind, and Bootstrap, combined with interactive logic powered by JavaScript with the Vue.js framework for dynamic application development.

Back End

Building robust and scalable server-side applications using languages like PHP and frameworks like Laravel, SSdatabase management, and seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems.

Dev Ops

Streamlining development workflows with tools like Git for version control and GitHub for collaboration and code deployment, and maintaining code integrity across all stages of development.

DBMS

Managing and optimizing databases using MySQL for structured data storage and Firebase for real-time database solutions, ensuring efficient data handling, seamless synchronization, and reliable performance across applications.

Mobile Dev

Create simple, visually appealing apps using Dart and Flutter, with a focus on cross-platform compatibility, fluid user interfaces.

Web & Apps Design

Create design, visually for web, apps using figma, with a beautiful design fluid user interfaces.
